backend/templates/.description: Only base.html template exists currently. Other templates (index.html, aws/*.html, errors/*.html) listed in subtask-2-2 do not exist yet and may be created in future subtasks.

backend/static/css/.description: CSS directory and files (custom-theme.css, styles.css) did not exist in the project. Created them with CloudOpsTools branding to support base.html template which references these files.

backend/static/img/logos/.description: Logo files (7 total: 4 Rackspace + 3 DIR) were in backend/static/img/logos/ directory, not backend/static/images/. These files were already removed from the current branch - the directory no longer exists. The base.html template was already updated in subtask-2-1 to remove logo references and use CloudOpsTools text branding instead.
